Layer.copy9Patch

機能/意味
9 Image copy using path (1.3.0 or later)
タイプ
Layerクラスのメソッド
構文
copy9Patch(src)
引数
src 　Specify the copy source layer object.
　Bitmap class objects can also be specified.
戻り値
Margin information
説明
　9 Copy the image using path (slice).
　The returned margin information is a Rect class object.
